snippet: For the first time, government prosecutors on Friday disclosed that the arrest of Joseph Hunter, who is charged in a murder-for-hire plot, was aided by his boss, a seasoned South African criminal.
abstract: Federal prosecutors acknowledge using veteran outlaw Paul Le Roux in sting operation to capture mercenary Joseph Hunter; defense claims move was entrapment, but prosecutors say Hunter was active participant and not manipulated by government in planned assassination.
lead_paragraph: For the first time, government prosecutors on Friday disclosed that the arrest of Joseph Hunter, who is charged in a murder-for-hire plot, was aided by his boss, a seasoned South African criminal.

headline.main: U.S. Reveals Criminal Boss’s Role in Capturing a Mercenary
headline.print_headline: U.S. Reveals Boss’s Role in Capturing a Mercenary
